span.span: Enables the use of Language-Integrated Query (LINQ) in an ASP.NET Web page through markup text to retrieve and modify data from a data object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [操作顺序Order of Operations](#order_of_operations) - [对数据进行排序Ordering Data](#ordering_data) - [数据分组Grouping Procedures](#working_with_stored_procedures) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 语言集成查询 (LINQ) 是定义一组查询运算符，以便在任何声明性方式表示遍历、 筛选和投影操作的查询语法。基于网络的编程语言。Language-Integrated Query (LINQ) is a query syntax that defines a set of query operators that enable traversal, filter, and projection operations to be expressed in a declarative way in any .NET-based programming language. 数据对象可以是内存中数据收集或从数据库中表示数据的对象。The data object can be an in-memory data collection or an object that represents data from a database. 你可以检索或修改数据而无需编写 SQL 命令为每个操作。You can retrieve or modify the data without having to write SQL commands for each operation. 控制，你可以使用 ASP.NET Web 页中的 LINQ 通过标记文本中设置属性。The control enables you to use LINQ in an ASP.NET Web page by setting properties in markup text. 控件使用 LINQ to SQL 会自动生成数据命令。The control uses LINQ to SQL to automatically generate the data commands. 有关 LINQ to SQL 的详细信息，请参阅[LINQ to SQL](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655)。For more information about LINQ to SQL, see [LINQ to SQL](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655). 当你从内存中的数据集合在检索数据时，您设置属性设置为包含数据收集的类。When you are retrieving data from an in-memory data collection, you set the property to the class that contains the data collection. 你设置属性的属性或字段的返回数据集合。You set the property to the property or field that returns the data collection. 例如，可能有一个名为类`Person`，其中包含一个名为属性`FavoriteCities`返回的字符串值的数组。For example, you might have a class named `Person` that contains a property named `FavoriteCities` that returns an array of string values. 在这种情况下，设置属性`Person`并设置属性`FavoriteCities`。In that case, you set the property to `Person` and set the property to `FavoriteCities`. 在查询数据库时，你必须首先创建表示数据库和其表的实体类。When you are querying a database, you must first create entity classes that represent the database and its tables. 你可以使用[!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_long](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-long-md.md)]或 SqlMetal.exe 实用程序来生成这些类。You can use the [!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_long](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-long-md.md)] or the SqlMetal.exe utility to generate these classes. 然后设置属性表示数据库的类并设置属性表示数据库表的属性。You then set the property to the class that represents the database and set the property to the property that represents the database table. ## 操作顺序Order of Operations 控件应用数据操作顺序如下：The control applies data operations in the following order: 1. 其中 （指定哪些数据记录返回）。Where (specify which data records to return). 2. Order By （排序）。Order By (sort). 3. Group By （共享的值的聚合数据记录）。Group By (aggregate data records that share values). 4. Order By （排序分组数据） 的组。Order Groups By (sort grouped data). 5. （指定的字段或属性返回） 的选择。Select (specify which fields or properties to return). 6. 自动排序 （由用户选定的属性数据记录进行排序）。Auto-sort (sort data records by a property that the user has selected). 7. 自动页 （检索已由用户选择的数据记录的子集）。Auto-page (retrieve a subset of data records that were selected by the user). 您可以添加到条件属性筛选从查询返回的数据记录。You can add conditions to the property to filter the data records that are returned from a query. 如果未设置属性，控件中检索此数据对象中的每个记录。If the property is not set, the control retrieves every record from the data object. ## 对数据进行排序Ordering Data 你使用属性来指定从返回的数据要作为排序依据的属性的名称。You use the property to specify the names of properties from the returned data to sort by. > [!NOTE] > 当你使用控件替换为[!INCLUDE[ss2k](~/includes/ss2k-md.md)]或[!INCLUDE[ssEW](~/includes/ssew-md.md)]和属性设置为`true`，你必须提供中的值属性。When you use the control with [!INCLUDE[ss2k](~/includes/ss2k-md.md)] or [!INCLUDE[ssEW](~/includes/ssew-md.md)] and the property is set to `true`, you must provide a value in the property. 默认情况下，属性是`true`。By default, the property is `true`. 如果将值赋给属性，你还必须包括所有的 identity 列在查询中返回的属性列表。If you assign a value to the property, you must also include all identity columns in the list of properties that is returned in the query. ## 数据分组Grouping Data 你使用属性以指定哪些属性用于合并具有相同的值的数据记录。You use the property to specify which properties are used to consolidate data records that have the same values. 在您对数据进行分组，你可以纳入`Key`和`It`，它们动态创建中的属性，属性。When you group data, you can include `Key` and `It`, which are dynamically created properties, in the property. `Key`属性是指中或多个用于对数据进行分组的属性的值。The `Key` property refers to the values in the property or properties that were used to group the data. 例如，如果通过名为的属性组`Category`、`Key`属性将包含中的所有唯一值`Category`属性。For example, if you group by a property named `Category`, the `Key` property will contain all unique values in the `Category` property. `It`属性指的数据分组中的单个记录的集合。The `It` property refers to a collection of individual records in a grouping of data. 可以循环访问`It`属性，以检索已经合并分组操作中的单个记录。You can iterate over the `It` property to retrieve the individual records that have been consolidated in the grouping operation. 例如，如果通过名为的属性组`Category`、`It`属性包含所有的共享中的常见值的单个记录`Category`属性。For example, if you group by a property named `Category`, the `It` property contains all the individual records that share a common value in the `Category` property. 你使用属性来指定要用于对分组的数据进行排序的属性。You use the property to specify the properties to use for sorting the grouped data. 数据，进行分组时属性指定分组的数据中各记录的排序方式。When you group data, the property specifies how the individual records within the grouped data are sorted. 默认情况下，控件中检索数据对象中的所有属性的值。By default, the control retrieves values for all the properties from a data object. 你使用属性来指定的属性以返回你是否想要使用的可用属性的子集。You use the property to specify which properties to return if you want to work with a subset of available properties. 选择操作应用后 Where、 Order By 和 Group By 操作。The Select operation is applied after the Where, Order By, and Group By operations. 因此，如果 Select 子句中创建一个别名，别名不可用的其他子句中。Therefore, if you create an aliased name in a Select clause, the alias is not available in the other clauses. ## 在运行时计算值Evaluating Values at Run Time 如果你需要在运行时以进行排序，评估值筛选或分组的值，你可以将参数添加到， ， ，或集合。If you have to evaluate values at run time for ordering, filtering, or grouping values, you can add parameters to the , , , or collections. 如果你想要指定默认值，你可以将参数添加到集合。If you want to specify default values, you can add parameters to the collection. 如果你想要检查或修改值，数据操作执行之前，你可以处理， ， ，或事件。If you want to examine or modify values before the data operation is executed, you can handle the , , , or events. 若要取消数据操作，也可在检查根据用户输入的数据类中设置属性时出现的验证错误，你还可以处理这些事件。You can also handle these events in order to cancel the data operation or to examine validation errors that occurred when you set properties in the data class based on user input. 若要检查值，数据操作完成之后，处理， ， ，或事件。To examine values after the data operation has finished, handle the , , , or events. ## 使用存储过程Working with Stored Procedures 你使用控件从存储过程检索数据，通过创建的事件处理程序事件。You use the control to retrieve data from a stored procedure by creating an event handler for the event. 在事件处理程序，你表示存储的过程的数据上下文类中调用该方法并将结果设置为属性对象。In the event handler, you call the method in the data context class that represents the stored procedure and set the result to the property of the object. 如果你要启用自动更新、 插入和删除操作的数据，从方法返回的类型必须与匹配中指定的类型属性。If you want to enable automatic update, insert, and delete operations for the data, the type that is returned from the method must match the type that is specified in the property. 有关创建数据上下文方法的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 创建 DataContext 方法映射到存储的过程和函数 （O/R 设计器）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e7ca32f1-50b3-48af-ad92-ceafd749296a)。For more information about creating data context methods, see [How to: Create DataContext methods mapped to stored procedures and functions (O/R Designer)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e7ca32f1-50b3-48af-ad92-ceafd749296a). ## remarks.format: ## Remarks 你使用属性来指定哪些属性用于将合并具有相同的值的数据记录。You use the property to specify which properties are used for consolidating data records that have the same values. 例如，如果你设置属性`Name`，查询具有相同的所有记录`Name`作为单个合并记录返回属性值。For example, if you set the property to `Name`, all the records in the query that have the same `Name` property value are returned as a single consolidated record. 你可以将分配到多个属性括中的所有属性的属性`new`函数，并使用逗号分隔每个属性。You can assign more than one property to the property by enclosing all the properties in the `new` function and separating each property by using a comma. 例如，若要按属性分组`Name`然后`Category`，将其设置属性`new(Name, Category)`。For example, to group by the properties `Name` and then `Category`, set the property to `new(Name, Category)`. 用于分组属性中的值返回通过名为的生成属性`Key`。The values in the property that are used for grouping are returned through a generated property named `Key`. 您包括`Key`中的属性属性来检索已分组的值。You include the `Key` property in the property to retrieve the grouped values. 你可以设置`Key`属性使用别名`As`关键字，但你无需使用别名。You can set the `Key` property to an alias by using the `As` keyword, but you are not required to use an alias. 例如，你可能会设置到名为的属性的属性`Category`。For example, you might set the property to a property named `Category`. 你可以检索中的合并的值`Category`通过设置属性属性`new(Key As ProductCategory)`。You can retrieve the consolidated values from the `Category` property by setting the property to `new(Key As ProductCategory)`. 你可以通过包括访问分组中的各记录`It`中的属性属性。You can access the individual records in a grouping by including the `It` property in the property. `It`属性包含共享中的分组属性的值的记录的集合。The `It` property contains a collection of records that share a value in the grouped property. 可以循环访问`It`属性来检索单个记录。You can iterate over the `It` property to retrieve the individual records. 属性通常用于聚合方法。The property is often used with aggregation methods. 你可以使用以下聚合方法：You can use the following aggregate methods: - remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，当更新和删除操作已启用，控制存储在视图状态中的所有记录的原始值。By default, when update and delete operations have been enabled, the control stores the original values for all the records in view state. 控制存储值的所有主键，并且所有属性不都标记为`UpdateCheck.Never`中`Column`属性。The control stores values for all primary keys and all properties not marked with `UpdateCheck.Never` in the `Column` attribute. 你设置`UpdateCheck`属性`Column`属性中[!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_short](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-short-md.md)]。You set the `UpdateCheck` property of the `Column` attribute in the [!INCLUDE[vs_ordesigner_short](~/includes/vs-ordesigner-short-md.md)]. LINQ to SQL 更新或删除数据之前，它会检查针对数据源中的当前值在视图状态的值。Before LINQ to SQL updates or deletes data, it checks the values in view state against the current values in the data source. 如果值不匹配，则数据源记录已更改。If the values do not match, the data source record has changed. 在这种情况下，LINQ to SQL 将引发异常和不继续更新或删除操作。In that case, LINQ to SQL throws an exception and does not continue with the update or delete operation. 有关 LINQ to SQL 的详细信息，请参阅[LINQ to SQL](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655)。For more information about LINQ to SQL, see [LINQ to SQL](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/73d13345-eece-471a-af40-4cc7a2f11655). 状态视图中存储的原始值可能会导致的页大小变得不必要地大和可以公开给恶意用户的敏感数据。Storing the original values in view state can cause the page size to become unnecessarily large and can expose sensitive data to a malicious user. 你可以禁用通过设置存储视图状态中值属性`false`。You can disable storing values in view state by setting the property to `false`. 如果你这样做，则必须提供您自己的方式，以确保数据未更改。If you do this, you must provide your own way to make sure that the data has not changed. 如果你设置属性`false`，原始值不会保留在数据绑定控件的视图状态。If you set the property to `false`, the original values are not persisted in view state for the data-bound control. 在这种情况下，LINQ to SQL 无法验证数据的完整性。In that case, LINQ to SQL cannot verify the integrity of the data. LINQ to SQL 将引发异常，该值指示数据冲突，即使数据源中的数据实际未更改。LINQ to SQL will throw an exception that indicates a data conflict even if the data in the data source has not actually changed. 如果基础数据源包含更新的过程中自动更新的时间戳字段，你可以存储视图状态中的此值。If the underlying data source contains a timestamp field that is automatically updated during an update, you can store only that value in view state. 在这种情况下，实体类中的时间戳属性设置为`IsVersion=true`和所有属性都设置为`UpdateCheck.Never`。In that case, the timestamp property in the entity class is set to `IsVersion=true` and all the properties are set to `UpdateCheck.Never`. 因为每次该记录中的这些数据更改时，数据库自动更新时间戳字段，LINQ to SQL 确定从该值中，如果数据已更改。Because a timestamp field is automatically updated by the database every time that data in that record changes, LINQ to SQL determines from that value if data has changed. 这有助于减少视图状态的大小，并且未公开任何敏感数据。This helps reduce the size of view state, and no sensitive data is exposed. LINQ to SQL 数据库中的时间戳值的状态将通过比较时间戳值视图中检查的数据一致性。LINQ to SQL will check for data consistency by comparing the timestamp value in view state with the timestamp value in the database. 有关详细信息，请参阅[演练： 使用时间戳与 LinqDataSource 控件与检查数据完整性](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e7700162-4f05-4130-81f7-3be1361027fa)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Using a Timestamp with the LinqDataSource Control to Check Data Integrity](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e7700162-4f05-4130-81f7-3be1361027fa).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用中的参数集合中创建 Where 子句在运行时。The control uses parameters in the collection to create the Where clause at run time. 你将参数添加到集合，当你想要以编程方式将一个或多个条件设置在 Where 子句。You add parameters to the collection when you want to programmatically set one or more of the conditions in the Where clause. 例如，您可能在其中搜索姓氏等于的值的记录的数据库表控件。For example, you might search a database table for records with a last name equal to the value of a control. 在这种情况下，你将参数添加到第文本框的值的集合。In that case, you add a parameter to the collection for the text box value. 如果不需要在运行时设置一个值，在 Where 子句，则不需要使用集合。If you do not have to set a value at run time in the Where clause, you do not have to use the collection. 你可以定义的字段中检索属性。You can define the fields to retrieve in the property. 例如，若要从数据库表中返回其中`LastName`等于"Adams"在标记中，设置属性`'LastName = "Adams"'`不带任何参数。For example, to return values from a database table where `LastName` equals "Adams" in markup, set the property to `'LastName = "Adams"'` without any parameters. 在中设置值集合，将名称分配给每个参数并将中的占位符为该参数的属性。To set values in the collection, you assign a name to each parameter and then add a placeholder in the property for that parameter. 在 Where 子句中，在与每个参数名之前 @ 符号。In the Where clause, preface each parameter name with the @ symbol. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用集合动态创建 Where 子句。The following example shows how to use the collection to dynamically create the Where clause. 控制权将返回中的值的所有记录`Price`大于中的用户选择的值的列控件。The control returns all the records with a value in the `Price` column that is greater than the value selected by the user in a control.
